Author: DinosaursAndStarStuf
Text: Right?? It makes me wonder if mom might have some mental wellness problems of her own.

Author: DineandRecline
Text: Ok first of all your mom can fuck off. A granola bar has what... 150 calories? Under no circumstances would eating a whole one make any significant difference in weight loss/gain. That pisses me off so much. My mom has done similar stuff including calling me "a ravening little pig" when I ventured into the kitchen for my first food in 36 hours. Ugh I'm sorry you have such shitty people in your life
